description.original: Supercharge your canvas experience! Create presentations, flowcharts and more!
description.translation: Supercharge your canvas experience! Create presentations, flowcharts and more!

dict..setName(\"Align node, created by double: .setName("Align node, created by double click, to grid")
dict..setDesc(\"The type of node that will be: .setDesc("The type of node that will be created when double clicking on the canvas.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, a node created: .setDesc("When enabled, a node created by double clicking will be aligned to the grid.")
dict..setDesc(\"The default width of a text n: .setDesc("The default width of a text node.")
dict..setDesc(\"The default height of a text: .setDesc("The default height of a text node.")
dict..setDesc(\"The default width of a file n: .setDesc("The default width of a file node.")
dict..setDesc(\"The default height of a file: .setDesc("The default height of a file node.")
dict..setDesc(\"Add custom style settings for: .setDesc("Add custom style settings for nodes. (Go to GitHub for more information)")
.setDesc("Add custom style settings for edges. (Go to GitHub for more information)")
dict..setDesc('When enabled, the arrow will b: .setDesc('When enabled, the arrow will be rotated to the direction of the edge if the pathfinding method is set to "Direct".')
dict..setDesc(\"The resolution of the grid wh: .setDesc("The resolution of the grid when using the A* path style. The lower the value, the more precise the path will be. But it will also take longer to calculate.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, the A* path sty: .setDesc("When enabled, the A* path style will be updated live while dragging the edge.")
.setDesc("When enabled, the A* path style will be rounded.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, the canvas will: .setDesc("When enabled, the canvas will zoom to the cloned node.")
dict..setDesc(\"The margin between the cloned: .setDesc("The margin between the cloned node and the source node.")
dict..setDesc(\"The step size for expanding t: .setDesc("The step size for expanding the node.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, a group that is: .setDesc("When enabled, a group that is collapsed show its border while dragging a node.")
dict..setDesc(\"If turned off, you can still: .setDesc("If turned off, you can still set the start node using the corresponding command.")
dict..setDesc(\"The default ratio of the slid: .setDesc("The default ratio of the slide. For example, 16:9 is 1200x675 and 3:2 is 1350x900.")
dict..setDesc(\"The padding of the slide when: .setDesc("The padding of the slide when wrapping the canvas in a slide.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, you can use the: .setDesc("When enabled, you can use the arrow keys to change slides in presentation mode.")
.setDesc("When enabled, you can use the PgUp/PgDown keys to change slides in presentation mode (Makes the presentation mode compatible with most presentation remotes).")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, the canvas will: .setDesc("When enabled, the canvas will zoom to the slide without padding.")
dict..setDesc(\"The duration of the slide tra: .setDesc("The duration of the slide transition animation in seconds. Set to 0 to disable the animation.")
dict..setDesc(\"The intensity of the slide tr: .setDesc("The intensity of the slide transition animation. The higher the value, the more the canvas will zoom out before zooming in on the next slide.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, closing a porta: .setDesc("When enabled, closing a portal will change the size of the portal to the original, closed size.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, edges into disa: .setDesc("When enabled, edges into disabled portals will be shown by an edge to the portal node.")
dict..setTooltip(\"Add classes to the canvas: .setTooltip("Add classes to the canvas wrapper element. Separate multiple classes with spaces.")
